Description: Enable secure API key-based authentication for trace ingestion. Users can create projects, generate API keys, and validate incoming traces.
Provide visibility into trace data through a web dashboard. Users can view projects, traces, and basic metrics.
Enable debugging of LLM calls through visual trace exploration. Waterfall view, span details, and error highlighting.
Official TypeScript SDK for instrumenting Node.js/Deno applications. Auto-tracing for OpenAI/Anthropic.
Official Python SDK for instrumenting Python applications. Auto-tracing for LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI, Anthropic.
Team collaboration features. Sign up, login, invitations, and role-based access control.
Proactive notifications for error rates, latency thresholds, and anomalies.
Visibility into LLM spending. Token usage, cost estimation, budgets, and trends.
Queue and database evolution for higher throughput. Redis Streams, Redpanda, ClickHouse.
